dmca.title: [EV1-C1068097H] DMCA Notification ISP Letter-Sony Home Audio/techresellers.com
dmca.body:
We are unable to locate on the below-referenced web pages any of the material that you claim is being infringed as of 9:31:32 a.m. (GMT-6). Legal Response Team ==== Forwarded Ticket ==== 1. DMCA Notification ISP Letter-Sony Home Audio/techresellers.com Added by system at Friday, Sep 22 2006 04:25 pm X-MailFrom: vtarver@netenforcers.com X-RcptTo: abacus@abacus.ev1servers.net Received: from [207.218.192.80] by [216.12.192.78] (abacus) for ; Fri Sep 22 15:26:32 2006 Received: from SMTP32-FWD by mail.ev1.net (SMTP32) id A000006D4; Fri, 22 Sep 2006 15:25:45 -0500 Received: from ms17.mse9.exchange.ms [69.25.50.217] by mail.ev1.net with ESMTP (SMTPD32-6.06) id A6C3493D0114; Fri, 22 Sep 2006 15:25:39 -0500 X-MimeOLE: Produced By Microsoft Exchange V6.5 Content-class: urn:content-classes:message MIME-Version: 1.0 Content-Type: multipart/related; boundary="----_=_NextPart_001_01C6DE85.60B36EEE"; type="multipart/alternative" Subject: DMCA Notification ISP Letter-Sony Home Audio/techresellers.com Date: Fri, 22 Sep 2006 16:26:26 -0400 Message-ID: X-MS-Has-Attach: yes X-MS-TNEF-Correlator: Thread-Topic: DMCA Notification ISP Letter-Sony Home Audio/techresellers.com Thread-Index: AcbehV3T/LPOzWpAQZSYC2LX4ikh+Q== From: "Victor Tarver" To: X-Declude-Sender: vtarver@netenforcers.com [69.25.50.217] X-Spam-Tests-Failed: None [0] X-Note: This E-mail was sent from mse9fe1.mse9.exchange.ms ([69.25.50.217]). (multipart/related) Multipart prefix (text/plain) This is a multi-part message in MIME format. (multipart/alternative) MIME element (text/plain) 9/22/2006 7005 1820 0001 9163 1363 VIA CERTIFIED US MAIL RETURN RECEIPT REQUESTED Everyones Internet Everyones Internet 390 BenmarSuite 200 Houston, TX 77060 Re: Unauthorized Use of Sony's Trademarks and/or Copyrighted Materials Dear Designated Agent: We have been retained by our client, Net Enforcers, Inc., to contact you with respect to unauthorized use of Sony's trademarks and/or copyrighted materials. Sony has retained Net Enforcers to assist with the protection and enforcement of its rights in Sony-owned or licensed trademarks, logos, and other copyrighted materials. Net Enforcers has in turn retained us to assist with this matter. Pursuant to 17 U.S.C. § 512 (c)(3)(A) and 15 U.S.C. § 1125(a) and 1114 et seq, we hereby notify you of Sony's good faith belief that your client, techresellers.com, at the URL www.techresellers.com, is using Sony trademarks and/or copyrighted materials without authorization by Sony, its agents, or the law, specifically with respect to home audio products sold by Sony's Home Products Division. Sony has a good faith belief that the information contained in this letter is accurate, and under penalty of perjury, Net Enforcers is authorized to act on behalf of Sony. The specific works, graphics or other material Sony believes to be infringed or to be the subject of infringing activity (the "Infringing Material") are copyrighted images from Sony's website. Specific violations of copyrighted images by techresellers.com are listed below this paragraph. http://www.techresellers.com/product_info.php?products_id=272948 http://www.techresellers.com/product_info.php?products_id=272943 http://www.techresellers.com/product_info.php?products_id=272677 http://www.techresellers.com/product_info.php?products_id=272526 Therefore, pursuant to the requirements of 17 U.S.C. § 512(c)(1)(C), Sony hereby demands that you remove or disable access to the Infringing Material in an expeditious manner. If you have questions, please contact Net Enforcers Compliance Management Department via facsimile to 352-505-0040, or via email to Compliance.Management@NetEnforcers.com. All communications should be in writing. Sony has authorized Net Enforcers to handle and resolve this matter with you. Please do not contact Sony directly, as Sony will simply refer the matter back to Net Enforcers. If your designated agent or representation does not respond to this demand as requested by 5:00 p.m. on 10/03/2006, we will assume that this demand has been rejected and proceed accordingly. Sincerely, VCLM law Lance C. Venable Attorney at Law LCV/roc Victor Tarver LMS Representative Net Enforcers Inc. VTarver@netenforcers.com compliance.management@netenforcers.com The Online Enforcement Specialists...... Statement of Confidentiality The contents of this e-mail message and any attachments are confidential and are intended solely for the addressee. The information may also be legally privileged. This transmission is sent in trust, for the sole purpose of delivery to the intended recipient. If you have received this transmission in error, any use, reproduction or dissemination of this transmission is strictly prohibited. If you are not the intended recipient, please immediately notify the sender by reply e-mail and delete this message and its attachments, if any. Thank you. MIME element (text/html)

9/22/2006

7005 1820 0001 9163 1363

 

VIA CERTIFIED US MAIL

RETURN RECEIPT REQUESTED

 

Everyones Internet

Everyones Internet

390 BenmarSuite 200

Houston, TX 77060

Re:
